function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation systems contributing to the spread of COVID-19 and other respiratory infections","Impact":"Increased transmission of respiratory infections, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation system design and maintenance, implementing mechanical exhaust fans, and using portable room air cleaners with HEPA filters","Technologies":"Mechanical exhaust fans, portable room air cleaners with HEPA filters","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and health and safety authorities"}]}
